summary: The Accountability Doesn't Expire Act (H.R. 4210) aims to extend the Pandemic Response Accountability Committee (PRAC) until 2030 and mandates a report to Congress by September 30, 2030, on the impact of statute of limitations extensions for Paycheck Protection Program (PPP) loans. The bill amends the CARES Act, focusing on accountability related to pandemic-era financial relief and program oversight.
